scene.name: Doll play setup
scene.description: A desk with a soft plush doll or a jointed action figure

task.name: Play with a doll
task.description: Interact with a doll by changing its posture or simulating social actions
task.spoken_prompt: Task: Let's play with the doll. Please pick it up and interact with it.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：让我们来玩玩偶。请把它拿起并与它互动。

subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Start playing with the doll.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：开始玩玩偶操作。

steps.description: Start playing with the doll by picking it up or adjusting its pose
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: start playing with the doll.

constraints.notes: Handle the doll gently; if it is an articulated figure, avoid overextending the joints.
